sections.general: child family advocate professional profile talented administrative professional with background in accounting and finance. extensive knowledge of ar/ap, microsoft excel and quick books-software skills. fearless child family advocate comfortable taking a stand against threats to a child's safety or well-being. works directly with government officials, children and families to find the best care possible for every child. qualifications attentive listener excellent interpersonal skills sensitive team player family maintenance staff development detail-oriented relevant experience served many program participants who went on to earn high school diplomas or geds. increased office organization by developing more efficient filing system and customer database protocols. led support groups to help parents regain and improve their parent-child bond.
